‚è©Speed up cdf dump data (#1595)

# Description

Introduce a producer/worker pattern for downloading, processing and
writing to disk.


![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/39d4f837-07bf-47d3-9ae3-c5f2871126ec)


## Changelog

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## cdf

### Improved

- The `cdf download timeseries/assets` is faster through doing
downloading, processing and writing to disk in parallel.
 
## templates

No changes.
